code: import MainPartners from'./mainPartners';import NewCarousel from'../carousel/newCarousel';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import FetchData from'../fetchData';import Descriptif from'./descriptif';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const{data:partners}=FetchData('http://localhost:8000/partners');const{data:concerts,pending,error}=FetchData('http://localhost:8000/concerts');const{data:info}=FetchData('http://localhost:8000/info');const partnersList=partners&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainPartners,{partners:partners.filter(partner=>partner.frontPage===true)});const Descrip=info&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Descriptif,{info:info.filter(info=>info.type==="mainInfo")});const carouselList=concerts&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NewCarousel,{concerts:concerts.filter(concert=>concert.scène==='eXtravaganza !'),scene:"filtre pour jour"});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Home",children:[error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text",children:error}),pending&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text",children:"En chargement..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"programmationBox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"programmationText",children:"Programmation"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-preview",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NewCarousel,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Parteraires",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"textPartners",children:"Partenaires"})}),partnersList,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"descriptifTitle",children:"Qui nous sommes..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("article",{className:"descriptif",children:Descrip})]})]});};export default Home;
